name: line-chart
description: A line chart displays information graphically using data points connected by straight or curved lines, making relationships among the data easier to understand.

groupComparator.description: A comparator function that determines the ordering of the chart groups when using a DataProvider. If undefined, the group will follow the order in which they are found in the data.

stack.description: Defines whether the data items are stacked.

on.description: Data items belonging to same group will be stacked.

off.description: Data items will not be stacked.

drilling.description: Whether drilling is enabled. Drillable objects will show a pointer cursor on hover and fire an ojDrill event on click (double click if selection is enabled). Use "on" to enable drilling for all series objects (legend items), group objects (x-axis labels), and data items. Use "seriesOnly" or "groupsOnly" to enable drilling for series objects or group objects only. To enable or disable drilling on individual series, group, or data item, use the drilling attribute in each series, group, or data item.

on.description: Drilling is enabled on data items, axis labels and legend items.

seriesOnly.description: Drilling is enabled only on legend items. Use multiSeriesDrilling attribute to enable drilling on the legend item for Other.

groupsOnly.description: Drilling is enabled only on axis labels.

splitDualY.description: Defines whether the plot area is split into two sections.

on.description: Plot Area is split into two sections, one for each Y-axis.

splitterPosition.description: Specifies the fraction of the space that is given to the Y-axis subchart.

timeAxisType.description: The time axis type of the chart x axis.

enabled.description: The regular time axis type. Time values are passed using oj-c-line-chart-item group-id attribute.

mixedFrequency.description: The mixed frequency time axis type. The mixed frequency time axis type is used when different series have different sampling frequencies. Time values are passed using oj-c-line-chart-item x attribute.

skipGaps.description: The regular time axis type. Time values are passed using oj-c-line-chart-item group-id attribute. Gap between time values will be ignored.

yAxis.description: The yAxis options for the chart.

dataMax.description: The maximum value of the chart data.

dataMin.description: The minimum value of the chart data.

max.description: The maximum value of the y axis.

min.description: The minimum value of the y axis.

majorTick.description: The y axis major tick properties.

on.description: Does not render the minor tick.

auto.description: Renders the minor tick for log scale.

minorTick.description: The y axis minor tick properties.

rendered.description: Whether the minor tick are rendered.

on.description: Does not render the minor tick.

auto.description: Renders the minor tick for log scale.

tickLabel.description: The y axis tick label properties.

converter.description: The converter to format the axis tick labels.

rendered.description: Whether the tick labels are rendered or not.

off.description: Axis tick labels won't be rendered.

style.description: The style of the tick labels.

viewportMin.description: The current minimum value of y axis viewport.

viewportMax.description: The current maximum value of y axis viewport.

step.description: The increment between major tick marks in y axis.

y2Axis.description: The y2Axis options for the chart.

dataMax.description: The maximum value of the chart data.

dataMin.description: The minimum value of the chart data.

max.description: The maximum value of the y axis.

min.description: The minimum value of the y axis.

majorTick.description: The y axis major tick properties.

on.description: Does not render the minor tick.

auto.description: Renders the minor tick for log scale.

minorTick.description: The y axis minor tick properties.

rendered.description: Whether the minor tick are rendered.

on.description: Does not render the minor tick.

auto.description: Renders the minor tick for log scale.

tickLabel.description: The y axis tick label properties.

converter.description: The converter to format the axis tick labels.

rendered.description: Whether the tick labels are rendered or not.

off.description: Axis tick labels won't be rendered.

style.description: The style of the tick labels.

viewportMin.description: The current minimum value of y axis viewport.

viewportMax.description: The current maximum value of y axis viewport.

step.description: The increment between major tick marks in y axis.

xAxis.description: The xAxis options for the chart.

majorTick.description: The x axis major tick properties.

on.description: Does not render the minor tick.

auto.description: Renders the minor tick for log scale.

minorTick.description: The x axis minor tick properties.

rendered.description: Whether the minor tick are rendered.

on.description: Does not render the minor tick.

auto.description: Renders the minor tick for log scale.

tickLabel.description: The x axis tick label properties.

converter.description: The converter to format the axis tick labels.

rendered.description: Whether the tick labels are rendered or not.

off.description: Axis tick labels won't be rendered.

rotation.description: Whether the ticklabels can be rotated.

none.description: The axis labels will not be rotated.

off.description: The axis labels might be rotated in order to fit more labels.

style.description: The style of the tick labels.

viewportMin.description: The current minimum value of x axis viewport.

viewportMax.description: The current maximum value of x axis viewport.

step.description: The increment between major tick marks in x axis.

plotArea.description: The plot area of the chart.

backgroundColor.description: The background color of the plot area.

valueFormats.description: An object specifying value formatting and tooltip behavior, whose keys generally correspond to the attribute names on the data items.

group.description: The object defining formatting and tooltip behavior for the group.

tooltipLabel.description: A string representing the label that is displayed before the value in the tooltip.

tooltipDisplay.description: Whether the value is displayed in the tooltip.

off.description: The property will not be displayed in tooltip.

on.description: The property will be displayed in tooltip.

series.description: The object defining formatting and tooltip behavior for the series.

tooltipLabel.description: A string representing the label that is displayed before the value in the tooltip.

tooltipDisplay.description: Whether the value is displayed in the tooltip.

off.description: The property will not be displayed in tooltip.

on.description: The property will be displayed in tooltip.

value.description: The object defining formatting and tooltip behavior for the value.

converter.description: The converter to format the numerical value for the tooltip.

tooltipLabel.description: A string representing the label that is displayed before the value in the tooltip.

tooltipDisplay.description: Whether the value is displayed in the tooltip.

off.description: The property will not be displayed in tooltip.

on.description: The property will be displayed in tooltip.

styleDefaults.description: An object specifying default styles for chart style attributes..

rendered.description: Whether the group separator lines are rendered.

color.description: The color of the group separator lines.

seriesComparator.description: A comparator function that determines the ordering of the chart series when using a DataProvider. If undefined, the series will follow the order in which they are found in the data.

data.description: Specifies the DataProvider for the sections and items of the line-chart.

exceptionStatus.description: Data sets from a DataProvider cannot be sent to WebDriverJS; use ViewModels or page variables instead.

selection.description: An array containing the ids of the initially selected data items.

dragMode.description: The action that is performed when a drag occurs on the chart.

hiddenCategories.description: An array of category strings used for filtering.

highlightedCategories.description: An array of category strings used for highlighting.

hideAndShowBehavior.description: Defines the hide and show behavior that is performed when clicking on a leegnd item.

withRescale.description: Rescaling of y axis when items are hidden.

withoutRescale.description: No rescaling of y axis when items are hidden.

hoverBehavior.description: Defines the behavior applied when hovering over data items.

highlightMatch.description: The matching condition for the highlighted property.

any.description: Any matching categories will be highlighted.

all.description: Items only with all matching categories will be highlighted.

legend.description: An object defining the style, positioning, and behavior of the legend.

itemTemplate.description: The itemTemplate slot is used to specify the template for creating each item of the chart. See the Help documentation for more information.

seriesTemplate.description: The seriesTemplate slot is used to specify the template for generating the series properties of the chart. See the Help documentation for more information.

groupTemplate.description: The groupTemplate slot is used to specify the template for generating the group properties of the chart. See the Help documentation for more information.

ojItemDrill.description: Triggered on a chart item (double click if selection is enabled, single click otherwise).

id.description: The id of the drilled object.

series.description: The series id of the drilled object.

group.description: The group id of the drilled object.

data.description: The data object of the drilled item.

seriesId.description: The id for the series the item belongs to.

groupId.description: The array of ids for the groups the item belongs to

value.description: The value of the data item.

x.description: The x value of the data item.

color.description: The color of the data item.

markerDisplayed.description: Defines whether the data marker is displayed. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series.

markerShape.description: The shape of the data markers. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series.

markerSize.description: The size of the data markers. Only applies to line, area, and scatter series.

categories.description: An optional array of category strings corresponding to this data item.

drilling.description: Whether drilling is enabled for the data item.

itemData.description: The row data object of the drilled item. This will only be set if a DataProvider is being used.

seriesData.description: The data for the series of the drilled object

items.description: The line chart items belonging to this line series.

seriesId.description: The id for the series the item belongs to.

groupId.description: The array of ids for the groups the item belongs to

value.description: The value of the data item.

x.description: The x value of the data item.

color.description: The color of the data item.

markerDisplayed.description: Defines whether the data marker is displayed. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series.

markerShape.description: The shape of the data markers. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series.

markerSize.description: The size of the data markers. Only applies to line, area, and scatter series.

categories.description: An optional array of category strings corresponding to this data item.

drilling.description: Whether drilling is enabled for the data item.

assignedToY2.description: Defines whether the series is associated with the y2 axis

categories.description: An array of category strings corresponding to the tag cloud items.

color.description: The color of the series. The chart legend item will inherit this color value.

drilling.description: Whether drilling is enabled on the series item.

lineStyle.description: The line style of the data line.

lineType.description: The line type of the data line or area.

lineWidth.description: The width of the data line.

markerShape.description: The shape of the data markers.

markerColor.description: The color of the data markers, if different from the series color.

markerDisplayed.description: Defines whether the data marker is displayed. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series.

markerSize.description: The size of the data markers.

name.description: The name of the series, displayed in the legend and tooltips.

shortDesc.description: The description of this series. This is used for accessibility and for customizing the tooltip text on the corresponding legend item for the series.

groupData.description: An array of data for the group the drilled object belongs to.

ojSeriesDrill.description: Triggered on a chart series drill gesture (double click if selection is enabled, single click otherwise).

id.description: The id of the drilled object.

series.description: The series id of the drilled object.

seriesData.description: The data for the series of the drilled object

items.description: The line chart items belonging to this line series.

seriesId.description: The id for the series the item belongs to.

groupId.description: The array of ids for the groups the item belongs to

x.description: The x value of the data item.

color.description: The color of the data item.

markerSize.description: The size of the data markers. Only applies to line, area, and scatter series.

categories.description: An optional array of category strings corresponding to this data item.

drilling.description: Whether drilling is enabled for the data item.

assignedToY2.description: Defines whether the series is associated with the y2 axis

categories.description: An array of category strings corresponding to the tag cloud items.

color.description: The color of the series. The chart legend item will inherit this color value.

drilling.description: Whether drilling is enabled on the series item.

lineWidth.description: The width of the data line.

markerShape.description: The shape of the data markers.

markerColor.description: The color of the data markers, if different from the series color.

markerDisplayed.description: Defines whether the data marker is displayed. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series.

markerSize.description: The size of the data markers.

name.description: The name of the series, displayed in the legend and tooltips.

shortDesc.description: The description of this series. This is used for accessibility and for customizing the tooltip text on the corresponding legend item for the series.

items.description: An array containing objects describing the data items belonging to the drilled group.

seriesId.description: The id for the series the item belongs to.

groupId.description: The array of ids for the groups the item belongs to

value.description: The value of the data item.

x.description: The x value of the data item.

color.description: The color of the data item.

markerDisplayed.description: Defines whether the data marker is displayed. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series.

markerShape.description: The shape of the data markers. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series.

markerSize.description: The size of the data markers. Only applies to line, area, and scatter series.

categories.description: An optional array of category strings corresponding to this data item.

drilling.description: Whether drilling is enabled for the data item.

ojGroupDrill.description: Triggered on a chart group drill gesture (double click if selection is enabled, single click otherwise).

id.description: The id of the drilled object.

group.description: The group id of the drilled object.

groupData.description: An array of data for the group the drilled object belongs to.

items.description: An array containing objects describing the data items belonging to the drilled group.

seriesId.description: The id for the series the item belongs to.

groupId.description: The array of ids for the groups the item belongs to

value.description: The value of the data item.

x.description: The x value of the data item.

color.description: The color of the data item.

markerDisplayed.description: Defines whether the data marker is displayed. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series.

markerShape.description: The shape of the data markers. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series.

markerSize.description: The size of the data markers. Only applies to line, area, and scatter series.

categories.description: An optional array of category strings corresponding to this data item.

drilling.description: Whether drilling is enabled for the data item.

ojViewportChange.description: Triggered after the viewport is changed due to a zoom or scroll operation.

startGroup.description: The start group of the new viewport on a chart with categorical axis.

endGroup.description: The end group of the new viewport on a chart with categorical axis.

xMax.description: The maximum x value of the new viewport.

xMin.description: The minimum x value of the new viewport.

yMax.description: The maximum y value of the new viewport.

yMin.description: The minimum y value of the new viewport.

ojContextMenuAction.description: Triggered when a menu item is clicked, whether by keyboard, mouse, or touch events.

ojContextMenuSelection.description: Triggered when a select menu item is clicked, whether by keyboard, mouse, or touch events.

setProperty.description: Sets a property or a single subproperty for complex properties and notifies the component of the change, triggering a corresponding event.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to set. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

params.name: value
params.description: The new value to set the property to.

getProperty.description: Retrieves the value of a property or a subproperty.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to get. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

setProperties.description: Performs a batch set of properties.

params.name: properties
params.description: An object containing the property and value pairs to set.
